name: Brain fART
description:
Aliens have destroyed their planet and bodies through war, and their only hope for survival is through a tenuous communication channel with humans by converting sound into art.

Game playable here: http://gamejam.adrianaleixandre.com

Credits:

Made for the New Mexico Game Jam 2016.

Adrian Aleixandre: Programming

Jae Marsh: Programming/Story

Aaron Harrington: Programming

Zachary McMillan: Story/Music

Bella: Art/Story

James Sandusky: Programming/Level Design

Patricia Gillikin: Story/Being Distracting ;)

Source here: https://github.com/rpcxdr/gamejam2016-pitch-mechanic
